data.name: Rule0002CommitMustBeExplainedByCommentDescription
data.value: Commit() needs a comment to justify its existance. Either a leading or a trailing comment.

data.value: Commit() needs a comment to justify its existance. Either a leading or a trailing comment.

data.name: Rule0002CommitMustBeExplainedByCommentTitle
data.value: Commit() needs a comment to justify its existance. Either a leading or a trailing comment.

data.name: Rule0003DoNotUseObjectIDsInVariablesOrPropertiesDescription
data.value: Do not use an Object ID for properties or variables declaration.

data.name: Rule0003DoNotUseObjectIDsInVariablesOrPropertiesFormat
data.value: Do not use an Object ID for properties or variables declaration. Use {1} instead.

data.name: Rule0003DoNotUseObjectIDsInVariablesOrPropertiesTitle
data.value: Do not use an Object ID for properties or variables declaration.

data.name: Rule0004LookupPageIdAndDrillDownPageIdDescription
data.value: Property "LookupPageID" and "DrilldownPageID" must be filled in table because it is used in list page

data.name: Rule0004LookupPageIdAndDrillDownPageIdFormat
data.value: Property "LookupPageID" and "DrilldownPageID" must be filled in table "{1}" because it is used in page "{2}" (list)

data.name: Rule0004LookupPageIdAndDrillDownPageIdTitle
data.value: Property "LookupPageID" and "DrilldownPageID" must be filled in table because it is used in list page

data.value: NotBlank should be set explicitly for tables with a single-field primary key.

data.name: Rule0015PermissionSetCoverageDescription
data.value: All application objects should be covered by at least one permission set in the extension.

data.name: Rule0015PermissionSetCoverageFormat
data.value: The application object {0} {1} is not covered by any permission set in the extension.

data.name: Rule0015PermissionSetCoverageTitle
data.value: All application objects should be covered by at least one permission set in the extension.
